review: Excellent product! It's fast and that's what I love. Power packed in a small device. Love it!!
author: sj_ind

review: We have the Stick and the actual Fire TV. Both work fine for us. We don't do much more than watch Netflix and listen to music with it but it's nice to just have an easier way to do that. The only problem I have with either device is that remotes are SUPER SUPER sensitive. You just bump them and it can shut off what you're watching...All in all, it's a great system and I love it aside from the ultra touchy remote.
author: M. Keifer

review: Really nice if you don't have cable, and when you are traveling. It does require an Internet connection
author: Dale L. Doerr

review: Works great. Much faster than vizio TV apps.
author: Adam D. Warren

review: This works great. Everything I needed and more. Would definitely recommend to anyone that is looking for a tv stick.
author: Jesse Evans
